column4: i need help; I need to set up my Wireless Card Driver; I have CD rom with Driver; the default driver is very slow
can some one help me install wireless driver?
I have 2.5 Ghz labtop and Ubuntu is so slow
yes
realtek
Alfa
I did a clean reformat
removed XP ... and installed Ubuntu
it takes forever to start up
which version of ubuntu? ubuntu 9.04 has optimized startup time
how much ram do u have
check out which process is using up the cpu, from system monitor
there you go, recovery mode takes longer time than normal boot
run xfix from recovery mode
yes
are u having this problem since fresh installation?
ubuntu isn't well supported by your hardware
whats your file system?
if fsck doesn't fix that, then your file system is corrupt enough to do another fresh install :P
no the ubuntu 9.04 default filesystem is ext3
now be familiar with ext3, ext4, jfs :)
what problem are you having? ubuntu should automatically detect your wireless
